otherNightReminder: If a player is marked with the "Chosen" reminder, wake Sol and show that player's character token.
name: Sol
ability: Once per game, while alive, publicly choose a player: that night, you learn who they are.

firstNightReminder: Mercury indicates either players or characters. Point to either the players or characters that visited Mercury.
otherNightReminder: Mercury indicates either players or characters. Point to either the players or characters that visited Mercury.
name: Mercury
ability: Each night, any living player may choose to visit you. You choose to learn either the players or the characters that visited you. If more than half of a living players, rounded up, vist you, information is arbitrary.

otherNightReminder: Show the character token of the player marked with the "Died tonight" reminder, swap that character token with the Venus token and add the "Is Venus" reminder.
name: Venus
ability: Each night*, you learn the character and gain the ability of the 1st player killed by the Demon. If that player is a Minion, you are poisoned until dawn.

otherNightReminder: If Terra is dead, wake them to point to a player. Mark them with the "No ability" reminder. Swap the Terra token with that player's token.
name: Terra
ability: When you die, choose a player: that night, if they are a Townsfolk, they become Terra.

firstNightReminder: Luna points to 3 characters. Give the head signal (nod yes, shake no) for if at least 1 of those characters is in play.
otherNightReminder: Luna points to 3 characters. Give the head signal (nod yes, shake no) for if at least 1 of those characters is in play.
name: Luna
ability: Each night, choose 3 characters: you learn if any are in play.

otherNightReminder: Mars points to a player. If that player is a Minion, that player and Mars die.
name: Mars
ability: Each night*, choose a player: if they are a Minion, you both die. There is a good player that registers as a Minion to you.

firstNightReminder: If Deimos is in play, wake Phobos, point to Deimos & show the Deimos token.
name: Phobos
ability: You start knowing Deimos (or that they're not in play).

firstNightReminder: If Phobos is in play, wake Deimos, point to Phobos & show the Phobos token.
name: Deimos
ability: You start knowing Phobos (or that they're not in play).

otherNightReminder: Jupiter indicates nominated or were nominated. Show the appropriate character tokens plus one incorrect character token.
name: Jupiter
ability: Each night*, choose to learn either which characters nominated today or which characters were nominated today. Either way, you learn an additional incorrect character.

otherNightReminder: Show 2 character tokens (include 1 chosen by the demon if the demon chose someone).
name: Saturn
ability: Each night, you learn 2 characters, 1 of which was chosen by the Demon (if no one was chosen, information is arbitrary).

otherNightReminder: If Saturn is dead, wake Titan to point to a player. Put Titan to sleep. Wake that player, point to Saturn and show the Saturn token.
name: Titan
ability: When Saturn dies, choose a player: if good they learn who Saturn is & if evil a good player learns who Saturn is. [+ the Saturn]

name: Uranus
ability: If both of your alive neighbors are good, you cannot die.

firstNightReminder: Neptune points to a player. Mark that player with the "Safe" reminder.
otherNightReminder: Remove all "Safe" reminders. The Neptune points to a player. Mark that player with the "Safe" reminder.
name: Neptune
ability: Each night, choose a player: they cannot die by execution tomorrow.

name: Ceres
ability: 1 or 2 of your townsfolk neighbors may be drunk, even if you die.

firstNightReminder: Wake each evil player individually, point to Eris and show the Eris token.
name: Eris
ability: Evil players, if executed, cannot die. All evil players know you.

name: Dysnomia
ability: You think you are Eris, but you are not. If you are executed, 2 good players are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day & 1 of them dies tonight.

firstNightReminder: Replace Vesta's character token with a not-in-play Minion token and mark it with the "Is Vesta" reminder token (that player is still the good Vesta). When this Minion would normally act, the relevant choices are made by the Storyteller.
name: Vesta
ability: The Demon has a not-in-play Minion ability.

firstNightReminder: Charon points to a character: Swap that character token with the Charon token and add the "Is Charon" reminder.
name: Charon
ability: At the start of the game, choose a Townsfolk: you gain their ability (even if in play) & register as that character.

firstNightReminder: Styx points to 2 players. Mark those players with the "Doesn't wake" reminder.
otherNightReminder: Styx points to 2 players. Mark those players with the "Doesn't wake" reminder.
name: Styx
ability: Each night, choose 2 players: they don't wake tonight.

firstNightReminder: Write down a piece of advice or information and give it to Nix.
otherNightReminder: Write down a piece of advice or information and give it to Nix.
name: Nix
ability: Each night, the Storyteller gives you a piece of advice or information.

firstNightReminder: Kerberos points to 1, 2 or 3 players. Wake each of those players individually, show them the "This Character Selected You" info token, then the Kerberos token. They nod yes to be poisoned or shake their head no to stay healthy, poison them accordingly. If none are poisoned after this, all are poisoned.
otherNightReminder: The previously poisoned players are no longer poisoned. Kerberos points to 1, 2 or 3 players. Wake each of those players individually, show them the "This Character Selected You" info token, then the Kerberos token. They nod yes to be poisoned or shake their head no to stay healthy, poison them accordingly. If none are poisoned after this, all are poisoned.
name: Kerberos
ability: Each night, choose up to 3 players: They are asked privately if they would like to be poisoned tonight and tomorrow. If all choose to be healthy, all are poisoned tonight and tomorrow.

name: Hydra
ability: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 2 players: they die, even if for some reason they could not.

otherNightReminder: Pluto points to a player. That player dies. If Pluto chose themselves: Replace the character of 1 alive minion with a spare Pluto token. Show the "You are" card, then the Pluto token.
name: Pluto
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you die, 1 of your alive Minions becomes Pluto.

otherNightReminder: Juno points to 2 players. Wake each of those players separately. Give the head signal (nod yes, shake no) for if those players are the same alignment (you may lie if Juno is evil).
name: Juno
ability: Each night*, choose 2 players: they learn if they are the same alignment. If you are evil this information might be false.

otherNightReminder: Sedna points to a player. If they are of different alignment as Sedna, that player and Sedna die.
name: Sedna
ability: Each night*, choose a player: if you are of different alignment, you both die.

name: Nibiru
ability: Once per game, a player might die at any time even if for some reason they could not.

name: Theia
ability: Once per game, when a player learns that they die, they may choose to also kill another player of the same alignment.

firstNightReminder: At the start of the game, if there are any homebrew characters on the character sheet or you are running homebrew rules, declare that the Bootlegger is in play and inform the group of all the homebrew characters and/or rules you are using in this game.
name: Bootlegger
ability: This script has homebrew characters or rules.
